survey_name: Online Grocery Delivery Service Feedback Survey
survey_brief: Gather insights about customer experiences with online grocery delivery services to improve service quality and operational efficiency

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your overall experience using online grocery delivery services?
questions.client_notes: Use a standard 5-point Likert scale to maintain benchmark consistency. Ensure mobile-responsive layout.
questions.scripter_notes: Radio buttons, vertical alignment, mandatory response

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your overall experience using online grocery delivery services?

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use online grocery delivery services?
questions.client_notes: Include 'Not applicable' if needed for non-users (though screening should precede)

script.question_text: How frequently do you use online grocery delivery services?

questions.question_text: Which platforms have you used for online grocery delivery in the last 3 months? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Randomize order of options to avoid bias. Limit to 6 choices for readability.

script.question_text: Which platforms have you used for online grocery delivery in the last 3 months? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What factors are most important when selecting a grocery delivery service? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Use a drag-and-rank question alternative for advanced implementations
questions.scripter_notes: Checkbox inputs with max 3 selections enforced

script.question_text: What factors are most important when selecting a grocery delivery service? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: How would you rate the accuracy of delivered items compared to your order?
questions.client_notes: Consider adding image-based smiley scales for mobile users
questions.scripter_notes: Radio buttons with horizontal display on desktop

script.question_text: How would you rate the accuracy of delivered items compared to your order?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the freshness of perishable items (e.g., produce, dairy) received?
questions.client_notes: Benchmark against Q1 satisfaction for correlation analysis
questions.scripter_notes: Radio buttons with same scale as Q1

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the freshness of perishable items (e.g., produce, dairy) received?

questions.question_text: Have you experienced any technical issues with grocery delivery apps/websites in the past 6 months?
questions.scripter_notes: Radio buttons with conditional routing to Q8

script.question_text: Have you experienced any technical issues with grocery delivery apps/websites in the past 6 months?

questions.question_text: What types of issues did you encounter? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Shown if Q7 = 'Yes, frequently' or 'Yes, occasionally'
questions.client_notes: Use this data to prioritize tech stack improvements

script.question_text: What types of issues did you encounter? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Shown if Q7 = 'Yes, frequently' or 'Yes, occasionally'

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your primary grocery delivery service to others?
questions.client_notes: Standard NPS question format. Display as 11-point scale slider on mobile.
questions.scripter_notes: Radio buttons in grid layout, numerical values only

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your primary grocery delivery service to others?

questions.question_text: What improvements would most enhance your online grocery delivery experience?
questions.client_notes: Randomize options to minimize order bias

script.question_text: What improvements would most enhance your online grocery delivery experience?

questions.question_text: How important is sustainable packaging in your satisfaction with delivery services?
questions.client_notes: Cross-tabulate with demographic data if collected

script.question_text: How important is sustainable packaging in your satisfaction with delivery services?

questions.question_text: Please share any additional comments about your online grocery delivery experiences:
questions.client_notes: Use text analytics for sentiment analysis
